TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ToolTask : Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task, Microsoft.Build.Framework.ICancelableTask
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ToolTask extends Microsoft.Build.Utilities.Task implements class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ICancelableTask, class Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITask
Public MustInherit Class ToolTask Inherits Task Implements ICancelableTask
public ref class ToolTask abstract : Microsoft::Build::Utilities::Task, Microsoft::Build::Framework::ICancelableTask
type ToolTask = class inherit Task interface ICancelableTask interface ITask

summary.span: 在衍生格式中覆寫時，提供包裝命令列工具之工作的功能。

span.span: When overridden in a derived form, provides functionality for a task that wraps a command line tool.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象類別會提供預設實作的方法和屬性的包裝命令列工具的工作。This abstract class provides default implementations for the methods and properties of a task that wraps a command line tool. ## Examples 下列範例會建立，執行[Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。The following example creates a that runs [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). ， ，和類別用來產生執行工作所需的資訊。The , , and classes are used to generate the information needed to run the task. [!code-csharp[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/CS/ILAsm.cs#1)] [!code-vb[msbuild_ToolTask#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_ToolTask/VB/ILAsm.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消執行工作的處理序，方法是先要求它正常關閉，不久之後就強制其結束。

span.span: Cancels the process executing the task by asking it to close nicely, then after a short period, forcing termination.

summary.span: 刪除指定的暫存檔案。

span.span: Deletes the specified temporary file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果刪除作業因為任何原因而失敗 （例如，如果檔案已被鎖定的防毒軟體），則這個方法會記錄警告，而不是擲回例外狀況，這會導致建置失敗。If the delete operation fails for any reason (such as if a file is locked by antivirus software), then this method logs a warning rather than throwing an exception, which would cause the build to fail.

summary.span: 取得一組環境變數名稱/值組。

span.span: Gets a set of environment variable name-value pairs.

summary.span: 設計成在自訂工作類別 (衍生自 ToolTask) 中遭覆寫，以傳回一組全新或變更的環境變數，來建立相關聯工具的執行內容。

span.span: Designed to be overridden in a custom task class (derived from ToolTask) to return a set of new or altered environment variables to create the execution context of the associated tool.
A set of environment variables.

value.span: 每個字典索引鍵是要覆寫環境變數的名稱，而字典值是要設定該環境變數的值。

span.span: Each dictionary key is the name of the environment variable to override, and the dictionary value is the value to set for that environment variable.

value.span: EnvironmentOverride 的預設實作會傳回。

span.span: The default implementation of EnvironmentOverride returns .

summary.span: 由等號分隔的環境變數組的陣列，應傳遞給繁衍 (Spawn) 可執行檔，以對一般環境區塊新增 (或選擇性覆寫) 環境變數。

span.span: Array of equals-separated pairs of environment variables that should be passed to the spawned executable, in addition to (or selectively overriding) the regular environment block.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此而不 EnvironmentOverride 採用 StringDictionary，這無法從設定 MSBuild 專案。Using this instead of EnvironmentOverride as that takes a StringDictionary, which cannot be set from an MSBuild project.

summary.span: 傳回在其中執行可執行檔的目錄。

span.span: Returns the directory in which to run the executable file.

returns.span: 在其中執行可執行檔的目錄；或者，如果應該在目前的目錄中執行可執行檔，則為 Null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: The directory in which to run the executable file, or a null reference ( in Visual Basic) if the executable file should be run in the current directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是一種方法，而不是屬性，讓衍生的類別 （例如 Exec) 可以選擇公開公用的 WorkingDirectory 屬性，而且可能會造成混淆，有兩個屬性。This is a method rather than a property so that derived classes (like Exec) can choose to expose a public WorkingDirectory property, and it would be confusing to have two properties.

summary.span: 取得工作之標準錯誤資料流的 。

span.span: Gets the of the standard error stream of the task.
The of the response file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主控台為基礎的輸出預設會使用目前的系統 OEM 字碼頁。Console-based output uses the current system OEM code page by default. 請注意，我們不應該使用 Console.OutputEncoding 這裡因為我們所執行的處理程序並非實際上擁有許多使用我們的主控台視窗執行 （而且也 Console.OutputEncoding 不會傳回的 OEM 字碼頁是否執行的應用程式裝載 MSBuild 不主控台應用程式）。Note that we should not use Console.OutputEncoding here since processes we run don't really have much to do with our console window (and also Console.OutputEncoding doesn't return the OEM code page if the running application that hosts MSBuild is not a console application).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主控台為基礎的輸出預設會使用目前的系統 OEM 字碼頁。Console-based output uses the current system OEM code page by default. 請注意，我們不應該使用 Console.OutputEncoding 這裡因為我們所執行的處理程序並非實際上擁有許多使用我們的主控台視窗執行 （而且也 Console.OutputEncoding 不會傳回的 OEM 字碼頁是否執行的應用程式裝載 MSBuild 不主控台應用程式）。Note that we should not use Console.OutputEncoding here since processes we run don't really have much to do with our console window (and also Console.OutputEncoding doesn't return the OEM code page if the running application that hosts MSBuild is not a console application).
